definition[0]: a sign, remark, event etc that shows what is happening, what someone is thinking or feeling, or what is true
example[0]: Could you give me some indication as to when I am likely to receive a reply?
example[1]: There is every indication (=there are very clear signs) that it is true.
example[2]: Dark green leaves are a good indication of healthy roots.
example[3]: He gave no indication at all of his own feelings.
example[4]: Taking a career history along with you will be a clear indication that you are well organized.
